name: Pooch Parade
description:
Oh no! Poochy stole the dog treats again!

Game Jam Stuff

Hello! This is my 4th game jam; I started doing them last year with LDJam37. I wanted to try out doing much lower res pixel art than I’m used to (16x16 instead of 64x64) this time around, and doing pixel art from top-down instead of the NSEW type of style I usually do. It was actually a lot harder than I thought! I also spent some more time than usual with getting the gameplay relatively polished. :)

My take on the theme was basically a mix between a corgi conga line through the snow and getting piled on by a bunch of dogs because you have food. Thus we have this little game.

Everything was created during the jam, except for the music/sounds, which was provided by others. (Thank ♥)

I hope you enjoy it!

Credits
  • ANYTHING NOT SOUND: twitter.com/paigemarincak
  • THEME MUSIC: Kawai Kitsune by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • SFX:
    • http://freesound.org/people/LloydEvans09/sounds/185828/
Technical Stuff
  • ENGINE: GameMaker Studio 2
  • ART: Aesprite
Controls
  • MOVE: Arrow Keys
  • OTHER: Enter
